attributes.action: Stop car finance and interest payments during COVID 19 UK
attributes.additional_details: stop making people pay car finance for a period of 6months and interest on missed payments creating more debt
attributes.background: stop making people pay car finance and interest on missed payments creating more debt

rejection.details:
Arrangements for the payment of car finance loans are a matter for individual lenders, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a number of petitions calling on the Government to provide financial support to individuals who have been affected by the coronavirus outbreak, which you might like to sign. You can find all open petitions relating to coronavirus here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=covid-19

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
